overview: This is a remake/remix of the No Pants Girls films starring the (original) Sweet Kiss trio of Saaya Irie, Runa and Jessica.  Episode 1: It's a Brave New World  - After Saaya gets her panties wet in a puddle, schoolmates Runa and Jessica decide to take off theirs too as a show of support. Chaos ensues.  Episode 2: Feels goooood!  - More panty-free capers and embarrassing exposures with a fourth girl
title: Oh! No Pants Girls
